Labels that are declared and not used anywhere in the code are most likely an error due to incomplete refactoring.
OUTER_LOOP:for(conststudentofstudents){if(checkScores(student.scores)){continue;}doSomething(student);}1234567Copy code to clipboard
In this case, probably removingOUTER_LOOP:had been forgotten.
Such labels take up space in the code and can lead to confusion by readers.
